pkgmetadata.longdescription: Regularization Paths for Lasso or Elastic-Net Penalized Huber Loss Regression and Quantile Regression // Offers efficient algorithms for fitting regularization paths for lasso or elastic-net penalized regression models with Huber loss, quantile loss or squared loss. Reference: Congrui Yi and Jian Huang (2017) doi:10.1080/10618600.2016.1256816.
